alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Rockingham, southwestern Strafford, southeastern Cheshire, Hillsborough and southeastern Merrimack Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hopkinton to near Rindge. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Nashua, Concord, Derry, Rochester, Jaffrey, Henniker, Merrimack, Northwood, Bedford, Milford, Hooksett, Amherst, Barrington, Litchfield, Hollis, Farmington, Epping, Peterborough and Hopkinton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 89 between mile markers 0 and 17. Interstate 93 between mile markers 6 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and southern New Hampshire.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough
